about_the_game:
Forged In Dungeon is a thrilling top-down action shooter that combines dynamic gunplay with realistic martial arts combat. Dive into a world of violent cyberpunk as you navigate through dangerous missions.

Become a Sci-fi Warrior


In Forged In Dungeon, you'll experience the warrior armed with future weapons, taking on dangerous contracts in a variety of futuristic locations. With a limited supply of ammo and resources, you'll need to strategic and outmaneuver your enemies to win. Utilize a wide array of weapons at your playstyle, including pistols, shotguns, and assault rifles, and use with masterful martial arts moves will allow you to take down enemies in stylish and brutal ways.

Immersive Visuals and Gameplay


The game's dark and cybernetic visuals, combined with its fast-paced gameplay, create a truly immersive experience. Whether you prefer to go in a guns flash or finish off your enemy with martial arts skills, Forged In Dungeon offers a variety of playstyles to suit your preference. Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled Battles through a world of beautifully crafted violence.

Ready to become the elite cyber warrior? Then dive into the cyberpunk world of Forged In Dungeon.
